pkgmetadata.longdescription: Signal and Image Processing Toolbox for Analyzing Intracranial 'Electroencephalography' Data // Implemented fast and memory- efficient 'Notch'-filter, 'Welch-periodogram', discrete wavelet transform algorithm for hours of high-resolution signals, fast 3D convolution, and image alignment; providing fundamental toolbox for 'iEEG' pipelines. Documentation and examples about 'RAVE' project are provided at https://openwetware.org/wiki/RAVE, and the paper by John F. Magnotti, Zhengjia Wang, Michael S. Beauchamp (2020) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2020.117341; see 'citation("ravetools")' for details.
